SELECT d.donation_code AS donationCode ,d.user_id AS userId ,d.raw_materials_co2_code AS rawMaterialsCo2Code ,rme.raw_materials_category AS rawMaterialsCategory ,rme.raw_materials_size AS rawMaterialsSize ,d.donation_amount AS donationAmount ,d.donation_date AS donationDate ,d.donation_status AS donationStatus FROM donation AS d INNER JOIN raw_materials_emission AS rme ON d.raw_materials_co2_code = rme.raw_materials_co2_code WHERE d.user_id = #{loginId} ORDER BY donationDate DESC LIMIT #{startRowNum}, #{rowPerPage}
